overview: 1. The Main Event -  What are PanoptiCons like to organise? What do the fans think of them? What do the stars think of the fans? All this, and there’s still time for a liberal sprinkling of stories from the production team!  However, you’ll see lots of other personalities from other eras as we stop along the way to look at particular aspects of the programme.
tagline: Highlights of Britain’s premier Doctor Who conventions
title: The PanoptiCon Tapes
